results.title: A Rare Cause of Abdominal Pain: Intestinal Angioedema
results.text_hl: A small volume of @<m>DISEASE_Ascites</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001201 @@@ascites@@@ was found in the abdominal ultrasound and the parietal thickening of the middle ileum in the abdominal computed tomography (CT).

citations.NLM: Ferreira TA, Alves MR, Oliveira AMP, Silva FSS, Pereira C. A Rare Cause of Abdominal Pain: Intestinal Angioedema J Med Cases. 2021 Apr;12(4):138-140. PMID: 34434446

results.title: [Correction of portal hypertension and renal dysfunction with help of nebivolol and lizinopril in patients with hepatic cirrhosis].
results.text_hl: The trust worthy changes of portal blood flow was not revealed in all examined @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@. But these @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ without @<m>DISEASE_Ascites</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001201 @@@ascites@@@ have demonstrated the improvement of the renal hemodynamic (renal functional reserve (RFR) by 56%, effective renal plasma flow (ERPF) by 17,3%).

citations.NLM: Fedulenkova LV. [Correction of portal hypertension and renal dysfunction with help of nebivolol and lizinopril in patients with hepatic cirrhosis]. Eksp Klin Gastroenterol. 2009;(5):130-7. PMID: 20201315
citations.BibTeX: @article{20201315, title={[Correction of portal hypertension and renal dysfunction with help of nebivolol and lizinopril in patients with hepatic cirrhosis].}, author={Fedulenkova LV}, journal={Eksp Klin Gastroenterol}, number={5}, pages={130-7}}

results.title: Converting enzyme inhibition improves congestion and survival in hypertensive rats with high-output heart failure.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ decreased LVEDP (p < 0.01), increased RBF, prolonged survival (both p < 0.05), and prevented @<m>DISEASE_Ascites</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001201 @@@ascites@@@ (0 vs. 46%) and increased PRA (p < 0.05) and attenuated the increase in plasma NE.

citations.NLM: Nishimura H, Oka T, Ueyama M, Kubota J, Kawamura K. Converting enzyme inhibition improves congestion and survival in hypertensive rats with high-output heart failure. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1994 Jan;23(1):149-54. PMID: 7511728
citations.BibTeX: @article{7511728, title={Converting enzyme inhibition improves congestion and survival in hypertensive rats with high-output heart failure.}, author={Nishimura H and Oka T and Ueyama M and Kubota J and Kawamura K}, journal={J Cardiovasc Pharmacol}, volume={23}, number={1}, pages={149-54}}
